catalog_info.title: Intermediate Arabic I
catalog_info.notes: Not open to auditors. Cannot be taken pass/fail. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 4360.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Arabic AA/AB series, or equivalent.
catalog_info.description: A thorough review and continuation of literary (classic and modern) Arabic grammar with emphasis on reading, writing, speaking and listening comprehension. Course materials draw from both classical and modern Arabic literature and culture. Required textbook: Al-Kitaab fii Ta'allum al-Arabiyya, Part II with DVDs, 2nd edition.
